offer_summary.job_description: Join a Fintech company as a Fullstack Developer (JS/TS/Node.js) for long-term cooperation with flexible hybrid work in Warsaw, focusing on modern financial systems.
requirements: Framework Knowledge: React.js (front-end) or Node.js (back-end), Redux (state management), Context API, Hook
CI/CD Experience. Experience with npm or yarn. Familiarity with Webpack and Babel
Experience with NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Firebase), SQL. Handling databases in backend systems using Node.js
Familiarity with serverless architecture (e.g., AWS). Experience with AWS services and cloud infrastructure in projects
Previous experience in startups, scale-ups, fintech, payment-related, streaming modern tech companies.
benefits: Challenging international projects in a Scandinavian business culture
Transparently built relations based on trust and fair play
Co-financed benefits: Medicover card, Multisport card
sharing the costs of sports activities
sharing the costs of foreign language classes
